title: React Components Assignment
description: Build a React application with functional components. Create at least 5 reusable components and demonstrate props passing between parent and child components.

title: State Management Project
description: Implement a todo list application using React hooks. Use useState for managing todos and useEffect for localStorage persistence.

title: React Hooks Quiz
description: Complete a quiz covering useState, useEffect, useContext, and custom hooks. Demonstrate understanding of React hook rules and best practices.

title: AWS Deployment Project
description: Deploy a web application to AWS using EC2, S3, and RDS. Configure load balancing and auto-scaling for production readiness.

title: Cloud Architecture Design
description: Design a scalable cloud architecture for a high-traffic application. Create diagrams showing components, data flow, and failover strategies.

title: Scalability Analysis
description: Analyze the scalability of a cloud application. Identify bottlenecks and propose solutions for horizontal and vertical scaling.

title: AI Search Algorithms
description: Implement BFS, DFS, and A* search algorithms. Apply them to solve pathfinding problems and compare performance metrics.

title: Neural Network Basics
description: Build a simple neural network from scratch using Python. Train it on the MNIST dataset and achieve at least 90% accuracy.

title: AI Ethics Paper
description: Write a research paper on ethical considerations in AI development. Address bias, privacy, accountability, and societal impact.

title: SQL Query Optimization
description: Optimize slow SQL queries using indexes, query rewriting, and execution plan analysis. Document performance improvements.

title: Database Design Project
description: Design a normalized database schema for an e-commerce platform. Create ER diagrams and implement the schema with sample data.

title: NoSQL Implementation
description: Build a REST API using MongoDB for data storage. Implement CRUD operations and demonstrate aggregation pipeline usage.

title: Linear Regression Project
description: Implement linear regression from scratch and apply it to predict housing prices. Compare results with scikit-learn implementation.

title: Classification Models
description: Build and compare multiple classification models (Logistic Regression, Decision Trees, Random Forest) on a dataset of your choice.

title: Feature Engineering Task
description: Perform feature engineering on a raw dataset. Apply techniques like encoding, scaling, and feature selection to improve model performance.

title: Text Preprocessing Assignment
description: Implement text preprocessing pipeline including tokenization, stemming, lemmatization, and stop word removal using NLTK.

title: Sentiment Analysis Project
description: Build a sentiment analysis model using transformers. Train on movie reviews and achieve at least 85% accuracy on test data.

title: Language Model Quiz
description: Complete a quiz on language models covering Word2Vec, BERT, GPT, and transformer architecture. Explain attention mechanisms.

title: REST API Development
description: Create a RESTful API using Spring Boot with full CRUD operations. Implement proper HTTP methods, status codes, and error handling.

title: Spring Security Implementation
description: Implement authentication and authorization using Spring Security. Add JWT token-based authentication and role-based access control.

title: Microservices Architecture
description: Design and implement a microservices architecture using Spring Boot. Include service discovery, API gateway, and inter-service communication.

title: CNN Image Classification
description: Build a CNN model for image classification using TensorFlow. Train on CIFAR-10 dataset and achieve at least 80% accuracy.

title: RNN Text Generation
description: Implement an RNN-based text generation model. Train on a text corpus and generate coherent paragraphs using temperature sampling.

title: Transfer Learning Project
description: Use transfer learning with a pre-trained model (ResNet or VGG) to solve an image classification problem with limited training data.
